description.value:
You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Lie] about having taken an action so convincingly that you acquire all the tangible benefits of having successfully completed it.

You can roll Deception in place of a different skill when attempting to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Earn Income], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Make an Impression], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Request], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Subsist].

You can use Fabricated Connections to Make an Impression or Request once per day, and you can also use it once per week to Earn Income or Subsist.
